title: First impressions
creator_credit: United States. Navy and Atlas Educational Films
brief_description: Made primarily to show how wartime office employees of the US Navy Department were to be introduced to their work by supervisors. Discusses reasons why new employees may not like their job and presents some primary steps in giving them a good first impression of their work.
creator_credit_for_label: United States. Navy and Atlas Educational Films
